text: Suroso (born Sidoarjo, East Java, 24 April 1981) is an Indonesian footballer who plays for Bhayangkara F.C.. He normally plays as a defender and is 178cm tall. In 2006, he helped Persik Kediri win the Liga Indonesia Premier Division. He also played for Arema Malang in the 2007 AFC Champions League group stage, where he was sent off in a match against Bangkok University FC. He has played with football clubs or teams with a home base in East Java, because he does not want to be far away from his family. Now, he stays in Lamongan and plays for club Persela Lamongan. == Career == He signed with Arema Cronus on 9 December 2014. == Honours == ===Club=== ;Persik Kediri * Liga Indonesia: 2006 ;Bhayangkara * Liga 1: 2017 == References == == External links == * Category:Indonesian footballers Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sidoarjo Regency Category:Sportspeople from East Java Category:Persik Kediri players Category:Persema Malang players Category:Persebaya Surabaya players Category:Deltras F.C. players Category:Arema F.C. players Category:Persela Lamongan players Category:Bhayangkara F.C. players Category:Liga 1 (Indonesia) players Category:Association football defenders
title: Suroso
